catalog_name.description: The name of the catalog where the schema and the registered model reside

schema_name.description: The name of the schema where the registered model resides

name.description: The name of the registered model

storage_location.description: The storage location on the cloud under which model version data files are stored

comment.description: The comment attached to the registered model

example.name: revenue_forecasting_model
example.comment: This model contains model versions that forecast future revenue, given historical data

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

403.description: Caller does not have permission to execute the specified operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Creates a new registered model in Unity Catalog.
